net.dean.jraw.http

Class HttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.http.HttpRequest

  • public final class HttpRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    This immutable class represents a HTTP request.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HttpRequest.Builder
      This class provides an interface to create objects that model HTTP requests.

    • Method Detail

      • from

        public static HttpRequest from(java.lang.String method,
                               java.net.URL url,
                               java.lang.Object... formArgs)
        Creates a RestRequest from the given URL
        Parameters:
        method - The HTTP verb to execute this RestRequest with
        url - A valid URL
        formArgs - An optional array of Strings to send as form data. See JrawUtils.mapOf(Object...) for more info.
        Returns:
        A RestRequest that represents the given URL

        public boolean isUsingBasicAuth()
        Returns true if the data is not null and it is valid
        See Also:
        BasicAuthData.isValid()

      • getSensitiveArgs

        public java.lang.String[] getSensitiveArgs()
        Gets an array of the names of sensitive form data arguments. The values of these arguments should be concealed. Only applies to a application/x-www-form-urlencoded request body.
        Returns:
        A copy of array consisting of keys whose values are sensitive
